actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to require court clerks to report the posting of bail in an amount exceeding $10,000 in certain criminal cases, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Illegal Drug Profits Act of 1991 - Requires each clerk of a Federal or State criminal court to report to the Internal Revenue Service the name and taxpayer identification number of any individual charged with a criminal offense who posts cash bail, or on whose behalf cash bail is posted, in an amount exceeding $10,000, and any individual or entity posting such cash bail for such individual.

titles.title: A bill to require court clerks to report the posting of bail in an amount exceeding $10,000 in certain criminal cases, and for other purposes.
